roleset.name: implant again

example.name: reimplant-v: all args
example.text: After an operation [ *0*] [ *T*]to reimplant the ureter into the bladder wall, the condition stopped [ *-2] deteriorating.

example.name: reimplantation-n
example.text: Reimplantation of the avulsed tooth can restore esthetic appearance and occlusal function shortly after the injury.

roleset.note: REIMPLANT-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from reimplant.01-v)
REIMPLANTATION-N NOTES: relation to implant.01, implantation.01 (from reimplantation.01-n)
